title: FPGA VGA Game
description: Developed a 'Flappy Bird' style game on a Basys 3 FPGA using Verilog.

modalContent.value: Developed a 'Flappy Bird' style game on a Basys 3 FPGA using Verilog. This project involved designing digital logic circuits from the ground up to handle game state, player input, and VGA signal generation.
